summary: This module defines a resource pool system for memory management in sendmail. It provides structures and functions for allocating, tracking, and automatically freeing memory and other resources, with support for debugging memory issues.

logs.reason: This message is used as a tag for memory allocations when debugging is enabled. It helps identify the source of memory allocations when tracking memory issues or leaks.
logs.resolution: This is a debugging tag, not an error message. If you see this in logs, it indicates memory debugging is enabled. No resolution is required unless it's associated with actual memory errors.
